# Aim


>###The aim of this workshop is enable you to thoughtfully and actively use R. You will learn the fundamentals of the R language, as well as cutting-edge packages for wrangling, analyzing, and communicating statistical data.  

]

.pull-right4[

<br><br><br><br>
<p align="center"><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/therbootcamp/therbootcamp.github.io/master/_sessions/_image/target.png" height="350"></p>

]

.pull-left4[
# Schedule 

We have a very ambitious schedule!

The amount you will learn in two short weekends is...crazy

4 days, 3 sessions per day, 2 hours per session

Each session contains a slide-based introduction and a hands-on programming practical

### Two Tracks

There is both a beginner (gray) and advanced track (red)

More details to come before each track

]

.pull-right55[

<img src="https://github.com/therbootcamp/therbootcamp.github.io/blob/master/_sessions/_image/schedule_2018Apr.png?raw=true" height="600" align="right">

]

.pull-left45[
<br><br>
# Introduction

45 - 75 minute slide based introduction

Theory + code examples + live demonstrations

[This is a Link!](http://therbootcamp.github.io)

Goal: Help you understand the basic concepts

All available online! Follow along, and don't worry about memorizing

Be interactive! Ask questions!

]

.pull-left45[
<br>
# Practicals

Write your own R scripts!

Anywhere from 10 ~ 30 programming tasks.

Starts easy, gets progressively more challenging

Struggle, work together, ask questions and challenge yourself!

We are here to help! But won't make it too easy for you :)

Go at your own pace and finish as much as you can.

We'll give you all the answers later

]




.pull-right5[
<br>

.pull-left5[
<br><br>

# 1-1 Coaching

Learning a computer language is <b><i>hard</i></b>

Take breaks when you need them, and don't get discouraged!

Sometimes, you may find yourself in need of some intensive help

That's ok! We're here to help!

At any time, you can request a 15 minute 1-1 intensive help / coaching session

We'll grab a coffee and work through it together


]
